title: Practical Collaborative Learning Course for Online Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: An online course designed for in-service practitioners to develop social sector expertise. Conducts non-real-time collaborative learning activities via an LMS, with digital devices provided.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to complete project-based collaborative tasks for solving real-world social problems with a participation rate of 80% or higher
Learners will be able to create a professional development plan through peer feedback and mentoring, proposing three or more actionable improvement strategies
Learners will be able to perform meaningful knowledge sharing at least twice weekly in online discussion boards and achieve an average score of 4.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in peer evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
